column5: My son and I have reserved cottage #8 at Lakair for the OFC G2G arriving on Thursday, June 21 and leaving either Sunday or Monday morning. We are looking for 2 people to share costs of this cottage for the weekend. Please send me a PM, [emailÂ protected] or call me after 4  at 905-333-0996 if you are interested  Tom

I would need more info. How is your son. Would it be OK if I brought my bride. And where is Lakair, what kind of fishing are we talking about (walleye, pike etc.....) What would be the cost involved. I am assuming two different boats ? ? ?
billy bob you may want to read the pinned thread about the Lakair G2G it will answer many of your questions  lakair G2G
You may want to contact the owners at Lakair as I think(dont quote me on this)that they charge per person in the cabin.Looking forward to meeting all y'all there. Joe
I think Kevin and Leslie show their rates for the facility, and you can stack as many as you want in there, but as Joe suggests, double check.
Looked it up,guess it depends on if you are doing the American plan or just renting a cottage. Joe
Dang Americans have to have a plan for everything.......
BillyBob  Do you know my son Mark, as you ask how is he doing.  Just wondering.
I think he meant to say, How "old" is your son. I maybe wrong though.
We all have plans  for up there....Having fun and hanging with the hosers! Joe
Dang right we'll make sure you boys get hosed.........
Well, from what I heard about last years GTG, if you sample some of greecoachdog's hooch, you will be the one getting hosed. You can have my share, lol.
There are so many cabins and so many campgrounds....everyone can fit in.
